title: The Botanical Caretaker
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), high detail 3D render, Pixar style animation still, a cheerful, rusty bronze-colored anthropomorphic robot centered in a bright, sun-drenched artist's studio. The robot is carefully watering a large potted Monstera plant with glowing blue water from a silver watering can. The studio features large arched windows looking out onto a blurred city skyline. The room is filled with lush, healthy houseplants, including orchids and hanging baskets. Two wooden easels with abstract paintings flank the robot. A small, flying companion drone-robot hovers to the side. Warm volumetric lighting, soft shadows, 16:9 aspect ratio.
